typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Delete from dbo.salestransformed\nDBCC CHECKIDENT(salestransformed, RESEED, 0)',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Delete from dbo.[sum sales]\nDBCC CHECKIDENT([sum sales], RESEED, 0)',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
